name: ContentProtectionKeyResponse
desc: A response to a request for an item’s content protection key.

items.name: keyResponse
items.desc: An encrypted key response that contains the item’s content key. For FairPlay Streaming, this is the content key context (CKC); for more information, see FairPlay Streaming Overview.

items.name: keySystem
items.desc: The content’s encryption type, which matches the configuration in  ExtensionConfig.Media.Queues.ContentProtectionKey.Cks.

items.name: leaseRenewalDeadline
items.desc: The length of time, in seconds, before the content key expires. If your service doesn’t impose time limits, return 0.

items.name: version
items.desc: The version of the client’s SiriKitMediaAPI library.
